Juggernauts of destruction, vavakias are formed from the souls of mortals who extract, enslave, or consume the souls of others. **[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 40 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 38 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35 [Vavakia](/Monsters.aspx?ID=976) **Source** [Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet](/Sources.aspx?ID=36) pg. 79 **Perception** +32; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344) **Languages** [Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +35, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +32, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +34, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +30, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +32 **Str** +9 **Dex** +4 **Con** +6 **Int** +4 **Wis** +6 **Cha** +6 **Items** [Breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10), _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [ranseur](/Weapons.aspx?ID=35)_ --- **AC** 42 **Fort** +32 **Ref** +28 **Will** +30 +1 status to all saves vs. magic **HP** 350 **Weaknesses** cold iron 15, good 15 **[Frightful Presence](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=17)** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) 60 feet, DC 37
**Restoration Vulnerability** A vavakia is repulsed by the restoration of souls. The demon takes 3d10+10 mental damage the first time each round that a creature within 100 feet of it is restored to life or loses the [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9) condition. --- **Speed** 40 feet, fly 40 feet **Melee** _ranseur_ +36 ([Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 25 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d10+17 piercing plus 1d10 acid and [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) **Melee** jaws +35 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d8+17 piercing plus 2d8 [persistent bleed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) and smoking wound **Melee** claw +35 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d10+17 slashing **Melee** tail +35 ([Backswing](/Traits.aspx?ID=173), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d12+17 bludgeoning plus stunning tail **Divine Innate Spells** DC 40 - **4th** [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) (at will) - **5th** [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) - **8th** [Divine Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=81), [Divine Wrath](/Spells.aspx?ID=86) (at will), [Earthquake](/Spells.aspx?ID=95) - **9th** [Massacre](/Spells.aspx?ID=186), [Power Word Stun](/Spells.aspx?ID=228) - **Constant (9th)** [True Seeing](/Spells.aspx?ID=344) **Rituals** DC 40 - **1st** [Abyssal Pact](/Rituals.aspx?ID=21) **Smoking Wound** A creature damaged by the vavakia's jaws is [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) from the rank smell of vapors from the wound. **Soulfire Breath** ([Death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [Negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118)) The vavakia exhales ghostly green fire in a 60-foot cone. Living creatures in the area take 20d6 negative damage (DC 42 basic Reflex save). A good creature that fails this save is becomes [stupefied 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) for 1 minute (stupefied 4 on a critical failure). A creature slain by Soulfire Breath can't be resurrected except by powerful magic such as a [_wish_](/Spells.aspx?ID=377) spell. The vavakia can't use Soulfire Breath again for 1d4 rounds. **Soulfire Inhalation** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) **Requirements** The vavakia's last action was Soulfire Breath; **Effect** The vavakia inhales and regains 10 Hit Points for each creature damaged by its Soulfire Breath. Any excess healing is gained as temporary Hit Points, which remain for 1 minute. **Stunning Tail** ([Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93)) If the vavakia critically hits with its tail Strike, the target must succeed at a DC 40 Fortitude save or be [stunned](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) for 1 round (1d4 rounds on a critical failure). **[Trample](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=39)** Large or smaller, claw, DC 40
Saurian Tyrants Vavakias carve out tyrannical empires throughout the [Abyss](/Planes.aspx?ID=13), particularly in steaming jungles and fetid swamps. Their minions are usually lesser demons, [xulgaths](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=102), or [saurians](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=204). They enjoy coming to the [Material Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=1) to feed on souls and spread devastation.
